017package org.apache.commons.chain.generic;
018
019import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertEquals;
020import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertFalse;
021import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertNotNull;
022import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertNull;
023import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertTrue;
024
025import java.util.HashMap;
026
027import org.apache.commons.chain.Context;
028import org.apache.commons.chain.impl.ContextBase;
029import org.junit.jupiter.api.AfterEach;
030import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
031
032/**
033 * JUnitTest case for class: org.apache.commons.chain.generic.DispatchCommand
034 * */
035public class DispatchCommandTestCase {
036
037    // -------------------------------------------------- Overall Test Methods
038
039    /**
040     * tearDown method for test case
041     */
042    @AfterEach
043    protected void tearDown() {
044    }
045
046    // ------------------------------------------------ Individual Test Methods
047
048    @Test
049    public void testMethodDispatch() throws Exception {
050        TestCommand test = new TestCommand();
051
052        test.setMethod("testMethod");
053        Context context = new ContextBase();
054        assertNull(context.get("foo"));
055        boolean result = test.execute(context);
056        assertTrue(result);
057        assertNotNull(context.get("foo"));
058        assertEquals("foo", context.get("foo"));
059    }
060
061    @Test
062    public void testMethodKeyDispatch() throws Exception {
063        TestCommand test = new TestCommand();
064
065        test.setMethodKey("foo");
066        Context context = new ContextBase();
067        context.put("foo", "testMethodKey");
068        assertNull(context.get("bar"));
069        boolean result = test.execute(context);
070        assertFalse(result);
071        assertNotNull(context.get("bar"));
072        assertEquals("bar", context.get("bar"));
073    }
074
075    @Test
076    public void testAlternateContext() throws Exception {
077        TestAlternateContextCommand test = new TestAlternateContextCommand();
078
079        test.setMethod("foo");
080        Context context = new ContextBase();
081        assertNull(context.get("elephant"));
082        boolean result = test.execute(context);
083        assertTrue(result);
084        assertNotNull(context.get("elephant"));
085        assertEquals("elephant", context.get("elephant"));
086    }
087
088    class TestCommand extends DispatchCommand<Context> {
089        public boolean testMethod(Context context) {
090            context.put("foo", "foo");
091            return true;
092        }
093
094        public boolean testMethodKey(Context context) {
095            context.put("bar", "bar");
096            return false;
097        }
098    }
099
100    /**
101     * Command which uses alternate method signature.
102     *
103     * @author germuska
104     * @version 0.2-dev
105     */
106    class TestAlternateContextCommand extends DispatchCommand<Context> {
107        @Override
108        protected Class<?>[] getSignature() {
109            return new Class<?>[] { TestAlternateContext.class };
110        }
111
112        @Override
113        protected Object[] getArguments(Context context) {
114            return new Object[] { new TestAlternateContext(context) };
115        }
116
117        public boolean foo(TestAlternateContext context) {
118            context.put("elephant", "elephant");
119            return true;
120        }
121    }
122
123    class TestAlternateContext extends HashMap<String, Object> implements Context {
124        private static final long serialVersionUID = -367573884920704101L;
125
126        transient Context wrappedContext = null;
127        TestAlternateContext(Context context) {
128            this.wrappedContext = context;
129        }
130
131        @Override
132        public Object get(Object o) {
133            return this.wrappedContext.get(o);
134        }
135
136        @Override
137        public Object put(String key, Object value) {
138            return this.wrappedContext.put(key, value);
139        }
140    }
141}
